Record.ClassificationPath: Congenital, Hereditary, and Neonatal Diseases and Abnormalities/Infant, Newborn, Diseases/Amniotic Band Syndrome
Record.BroaderTerm: Congenital, Hereditary, and Neonatal Diseases and Abnormalities
Record.Description: A disorder present in the newborn infant in which constriction rings or bands, causing soft tissue depressions, encircle digits, extremities, or limbs and sometimes the neck, thorax, or abdomen. They may be associated with intrauterine amputations.
